accountTableClass.label: Account Table Class
accountTableClass.description: Class name of the accounts table used in this application

accountTableAlias.label: Account Table Plural Alias
accountTableAlias.description: Plural alias for the account table for relating $group->"Accounts"

loginIdentityLabel.label: Login Identity Label
loginIdentityLabel.description: Identity label for display use (login form)

loginIdentityColumn.label: Login Identity Column
loginIdentityColumn.description: Column of the accounts table in which to check the identity (username)

loginCredentialLabel.label: Login Credential Label
loginCredentialLabel.description: Credential label for display use (login form)

loginCredentialColumn.label: Login Credential Column
loginCredentialColumn.description: Column of the accounts table in which to check the credential (password)

loginCredentialTreatment.label: Login Credential Treatment
loginCredentialTreatment.description: Treatment of the credential input when authorizing ex: md5(?)

sessionExpiration.label: Session Expiration Time(in seconds)
sessionExpiration.description: Time in which sessions should expire (leave empty for browser default)

useSecurityErrorController.label: Use Security Error Controller
useSecurityErrorController.description: Use the security error controller for failed access and errors dealing with security

enableSystem.label: Enable Security System
enableSystem.description: Enables / Disables the entire system. This setting overrides all other enable / disable settings

modelPath.label: Model Path
modelPath.description: Path where the application-wide models are stored

dataPath.label: Data Path
dataPath.description: Path to the security module's data directory
